Income Before Taxes: income loss from continuing operations before income taxes
Net Income: income loss from continuing operations after income taxes

Other Income (Expense): gains losses on extinguishment of debt
income loss from equity method investments

Depreciation and Amortization: depreciation amortization and other excluding capitalized contract cost amortization
Other Operating Expenses: business combination acquisition and integration related costs
business combination acquisition and integration related costs and other

Basic EPS: income loss from continuing operations per basic share

Total Revenues: revenue from leased and owned hotels including operating lease income
revenues gross of capitalized contract cost amortization

__unmapped__: common stock dividends per share declared
restructuring and merger related charges recoveries and other
restructuring charges and business combination acquisition and integration related costs
restructuring charges and business combination acquisition and integration related costs and other
income loss from continuing operations before income taxes extraordinary items noncontrolling interest
